subject: Basketball
Coaches and Managers
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Eddy Curry was not benched in his hometown Friday night and thus avoided one major indignity. But he appears to have lost some of his coach’s faith, which may be a greater long-term concern.
snippet: Eddy Curry was not benched in his hometown Friday night and thus avoided one major indignity. But he appears to have lost some of his coach’s faith, which may be a greater long-term concern.
